author: Electronic_Field4313
comment: Chill, life has failures, just pick yourself up and try again, you'll be alright. Also, do you wanna go design because you have a passion for it or there's something within the design course that you won't be able to self-learn...?

author: unknown
comment: Comment by Flat_Marketing5236: hey man i read your other posts, im planning to drop out to a different diploma as a y3 student cause my diploma makes me depressed. I also thought i could pull through💀 and i almost did until 6month intern i couldnt fucking take it anymore. I think you can try to get some meds first or counselling. If those dont work honestly i would just change diplomas man, if your parents permit of course. (Alternatively you can take a gap year) feel free to drop me a dm if you wanna ask/vent about stuff Edit: okay now that im reading this idk your situation so this isnt the best advice ongod but i wouldnt rule out the idea.
